name: little ninja assasasins blades of shadows.
name_original: little ninja assasasins blades of shadows.
description:
Our heroes Jetry Stiny and Jiles get an offer from mesterious teenagers to teach them ninjutsu Jetry or his brothers do not find comfort in trusting them.

So are those teenagers just simply want to learn or do they have an evil plan in mind download the game and find out.

use arrow keys to walk space to shoot when you get to level 7 use z to jump from tree to tree.
